brief_description: To investigate the contribution of dendritic cells and basophils to TH2 differentiation, induction with OVA and papain was used to investigate signalling in both in vivo and in vitro systems.
brief_title: Cooperation between DCs and basophils in TH2 response to papain
condition_studied: TH2 cell response to challenge with OVA and papain
description: To investigate the contribution of dendritic cells and basophils to TH2 differentiation, induction with OVA and papain was used to investigate signalling in both in vivo and in vitro systems.
hypothesis: Basophils alone are not able to present antigen to T cells or stimulate T cell proliferation in vivo but require dendritic cells
objectives: Determine the contributions of dendritic cells and basophils to TH2 cell differentiation
official_title: Cooperation between DCs and basophils in TH2 response to papain
